caption: Death Note
about: Death Note is a now classic anime that follows Light Yagami, a teen who gains supernatural abilities via the Death Note. A book that grants the user the ability to kill anyone they want, just by writing that person’s name in the book.

caption: Attack on Titan
about: On that day, humanity was reminded of the fear they held for the titans.three friends, Eren Yeager, Mikasa Ackerman, and Armin Arlert. they fight alongside humanity's greatest soldiers against gargantuan

caption: Hunter x Hunter
about: He leaves the island on a quest to find his long-forgotten father who had left him behind. His only clue? He’s a world-famous licensed Hunter -- so Gon sets off to take the deadly exam and become a Hunter himself.

caption: One Piece
about: The world building, the deep characters, the hilarious adventure, and the amazing adaptation that sometimes beats out the manga catapults this series to the top of shonen anime history.
